pages.text: 51|52|Ebhabe tadera purbabatidera kache yakhana'i kono rasula esechena tara'i take baleche, ’e to eka jadukara, na haya eka unmada!’
51|53|Tara ki eke aparake e mantrana'i diye eseche? Baram era simalajayanakari sampradaya [1].
51|54|Kaje'i apani taderake upeksa karuna, ete apani tiraskrta habena na.
51|55|Ara apani upadesa dite thakuna, karana niscaya upadesa muminadera upakare ase.
51|56|Ara ami srsti karechi jina ebam manusake ejan'ye'i ye, tara kebala amara ibadata karabe.
51|57|Ami tadera kacha theke kono riyika ca'i na ebam eta'o ca'i na ye, tara amake kha'oyabe [1].
51|58|Niscaya allaha, tini'i to riyikadata, prabala saktidhara, parakramasali.
51|59|Sutaram yara yuluma kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche tadera samamatabalambidera anurupa prapya (sasti). Kaje'i tara etara jan'ya amara kache yena tarahuro na kare [1].
51|60|Ata'eba, yara kuphari kareche tadera jan'ya durbhoga se dinera, ye dinera bisaye taderake satarka kara hayeche.
52|1|Sapatha tura parbatera [1]
52|2|sapatha kitabera, ya likhita ache [1]
52|3|unmukta pataya [1]
52|4|sapatha bayatula ma’murera [1]
52|5|sapatha samunnata chadera [1]
52|6|sapatha udbelita sagarera [1]
52|7|niscaya apanara rabera sasti abasyambhabi
52|8|etara nibaranakari ke'u ne'i [1].
52|9|Yedina asamana andolita habe prabalabhabe [1]
52|10|ara parbata paribhramana karabe druta [1]
52|11|ataheba durbhoga se dina mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
52|12|Yara khelara chale asara kajakarme lipta thake [1]
52|13|yedina taderake dhakka marate marate niye ya'oya habe jahannamera agunera dike
52|14|‘eta'i se aguna yake tomara mithya mane karate.’
